title: ONE MINUTE OF SILENCE!!! SHHH... FOR MBAPPE! WHO IS DEAD! EAEAEAE EAEAEAE

author: doomfreak777
text: Theyll probably use WC win as justification to invade the Falklands tbh

author: Easy_Garden338
text: The Falkland Islands defence force is strong enough to take on whatever the Argentines have left these days so they should do the right thing and let go of that nonsense

author: lolipop211
text: The fuck does that have to do with the World Cup. Does NO ONE remember that we were under a military dictatorship and we were forced to fight for them? The falklands represent our fallen soldiers who were mostly young kids sent without equipment or training. It was a dark point in our history and the Falklands ‚Äúson argentinas‚Äù in our hearts because of the needless blood spilled to get them

author: Ducksoup_RBLX
text: Then lose it again, and attack a car show when they make fun of it, sounds good üëç

author: Elizasol
text:
How much pain do you feel watching Argentina be champions of the world. Third World Cup Trophy. And watching your country get eliminated yet again without beating a single good team.

It feels so good to see angry comments like yours, it's not as enjoyable when the losers say nothing. :DDD
